subject: problems in accessing buttons in a table using  jwebunit
msgSnippet: Hi I am using jWebunit for doing unit as well as integration testing of a web application. In a page i have got a table where in each row i have got a button
messageBody:
Hi
I am using jWebunit for doing unit as well as integration testing of
a web application. In a page
i have got a table where in each row i have got a button with same
value(say "Go"). I tried to access the button in a row jwebunit says
no button with the value(Go) is available. Kindly help me how to
access a button present in a particular cell of a table and clicking
it using Jwebunit

TIA
satheesh
